decisions.name: Should_we_Create_a_Work_Schedule
decisions.label: Should we Create a Work Schedule?

Flow.description: Updated version where user also has to input Work Schedule
Flow.label: Screen Flow: New Employee

fields.name: displayErrorMissingButtonClick
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong...


{!CustomError}

fields.name: displayS1Header
fields.fieldText:
New Employee


Click begin, to submit information about an employee, so various accounts and accesses can be granted to them.

fields.name: S3displayOverdueAlert
fields.fieldText:
Importa﻿nt


There is less than 7 days until the employee is starting.


We cannot guarantee that all or any of the employee's accounts will be ready, when they start on the {!txtStartDate}.

fields.name: displaySelectWorkDays
fields.fieldText:
Set Work Schedule


Add the standard work hours for the employee, for example:


Monday to Thursday: 09:00 to 17:00

Friday: 09:00 to 16:30


If the Employee is not expected to follow a standard work-schedule, you can elect to not create one (e.g. if the Employee is a Lecturer and will work more sporadically)

fields.name: displayConfirmHeader
fields.fieldText:
Success


You've successfully sent information about the new employee {!txtName}.

fields.name: displayWeWillGetBackNotLate
fields.fieldText: You will hear back, once the employee has been created.

fields.name: displayWeWillGetBackLate
fields.fieldText: Due to late notice, the employee's accounts may not be ready on the day of start.

subflows.label: AL - Send Error Email from Input Values

subflows.label: SF - Create Single Work Schedule Set
